thread.title: Director of Golf - Tarzana - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Director of Golf - Tarzana - Sports Management

title: Director of Golf - Tarzana - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: The Director of Golf is responsible for promoting the game of golf through an operational structure and programming that provides for a "first class" environment for Members/Guests. S/he is responsible for all golf operations at the Club, including, golf carts, bag room, locker room, golf shop, special tournaments and Member/Guest events.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
